pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyPitch[![Tests](https://github.com/fofix/python-pypitch/workflows/Tests/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/fofix/python-pypitch/actions?query=workflow:Test)[![Build status](https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/status/0f6yb99cd37v6li6?svg=true)](https://ci.appveyor.com/project/Linkid/python-pypitch)[![Documentation Status](https://readthedocs.org/projects/pypitch/badge/?version=latest)](http://pypitch.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest)PyPitch is a C++-extension in Python to analyse audio streams for pitch.## SetupBuild the extension: $ python setup.py build_ext --inplace --forceInstall it: $ python -m pip install .## UsageImport it: from pypitch import pypitch## DocTo build the html doc from source:: $ python -m pip install -e .[docs] $ cd doc $ make htmlor:: $ python -m pip install -e .[docs] $ python setup.py build_sphinx
